content.description: Water of density <math alttext="rho" display="inline" overflow="scroll" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi>ρ</mi></math> flows through the section of circular pipe shown in the figure. At Point <math alttext="A" display="inline" overflow="scroll" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mtext>A</mtext></math>, where the diameter of the pipe is <math alttext="D" display="inline" overflow="scroll" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi>D</mi></math>, the water has a pressure <math alttext="P sub 0" display="inline" overflow="scroll" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><msub><mi>P</mi><mn>0</mn></msub></mstyle></math> and velocity <math alttext="v sub 0" display="inline" overflow="scroll" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><msub><mi>v</mi><mn>0</mn></msub></mstyle></math>. Point <math alttext="B" display="inline" overflow="scroll" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mtext>B</mtext></math> is located a vertical distance <math alttext="H" display="inline" overflow="scroll" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mi>H</mi></mstyle></math> above Point <math alttext="A" display="inline" overflow="scroll" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mtext>A</mtext></math> in a section of the pipe that has diameter <math alttext="2 D" display="inline" overflow="scroll" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mn>2</mn><mi>D</mi></math>.
content.question: Which of the following expressions is equal to the pressure of the water at Point <math alttext="B" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mtext>B</mtext></math>?

choices.label: <math alttext="P sub 0 minus rho g H" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><msub><mi>P</mi><mn>0</mn></msub><mo>−</mo><mi>ρ</mi><mi>g</mi><mi>H</mi></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="P sub 0 minus rho g H, plus the fraction 3 over 8, end fraction, rho v sub 0, end sub, squared" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><msub><mi>P</mi><mn>0</mn></msub><mo>−</mo><mi>ρ</mi><mi>g</mi><mi>H</mi><mo>+</mo><mfrac><mn>3</mn><mn>8</mn></mfrac><mi>ρ</mi><msup><msub><mi>v</mi><mn>0</mn></msub><mn>2</mn></msup></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="P sub 0 minus rho g H, plus the fraction 15 over 32, end fraction, rho v sub 0, end sub, squared" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><msub><mi>P</mi><mn>0</mn></msub><mo>−</mo><mi>ρ</mi><mi>g</mi><mi>H</mi><mo>+</mo><mfrac><mn>15</mn><mn>32</mn></mfrac><mi>ρ</mi><msup><msub><mi>v</mi><mn>0</mn></msub><mn>2</mn></msup></mstyle></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="P sub 0 minus rho g H, plus the fraction 15 over 32, end fraction, rho v sub 0, end sub, squared" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><msub><mi>P</mi><mn>0</mn></msub><mo>−</mo><mi>ρ</mi><mi>g</mi><mi>H</mi><mo>+</mo><mfrac><mn>15</mn><mn>32</mn></mfrac><mi>ρ</mi><msup><msub><mi>v</mi><mn>0</mn></msub><mn>2</mn></msup></mstyle></math>

skill.text: 2.A: Derive a symbolic expression from known quantities by selecting and following a logical mathematical pathway.
